virality_potential.justification: The tweet highlights a specific event (Solana outage) relevant to Ethereum users, likely to be shared within crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Provides a link to an event but lacks detailed information.

duration_of_impact.justification: Impact is short-term, tied to the specific event.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevance extends through the year as the narrative unfolds.
